Abstrak: In this research SERVQUAL theory that created by Parasuraman and Berry (1985) used to measure T-cash customer satisfaction level. This theory was used as tool to determine T-cash customer satisfaction level. Based on Parasuraman's SERVQUAL theory there are five variables that determine customer satisfaction level (Tangible, Empathy, Reliability, Responsiveness and Assurance).
